articles.description: Rapper says he can't stand to see President Trump in office
articles.content:
(Newser)
"I ain't never voted a day in my life," Snoop Dogg said in a radio interview last week," but this year I think I'm going to get out and vote." The reason he's never voted is that he's been … [+934 chars]

articles.title: Tiger King's Joe Exotic writes begging letter to Donald Trump requesting jail pardon - Mirror Online
articles.description: The TV documentary star is currently serving a 22-year sentence after being found guilty of 17 federal charges of animal abuse and two counts of murder for hire
articles.content:
Tiger King star Joe Exotic has penned a begging letter to President Donald Trump to request he be pardoned from his current jail sentence.
